code: import{serverRequest}from'../../CommonServiceRequest/serverRequest';export function cashRecordsAPI(parameter){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('GET',"/CashManagement/Records?registerId=".concat(parameter.registerId,"&pageSize=").concat(parameter.pageSize,"&pageNumber=").concat(parameter.pageNumber),'').then(function(singleCashDrawerList){return singleCashDrawerList;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function getDetailsAPI(cashManagementId){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('GET',"/CashManagement/GetDetail?id=".concat(cashManagementId),'').then(function(cashDetail){return cashDetail;});}export function getSummeryAPI(CashManagementId,RegisterId,LoggenInUserId){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('GET',"/CashManagement/GetSummery?id=".concat(CashManagementId,"&registerId=").concat(RegisterId,"&salesPersonId=").concat(LoggenInUserId),'').then(function(cashDetail){return cashDetail;});}export function openRegisterAPI(open_register_param){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('POST',"/CashManagement/OpenRegister",open_register_param).then(function(result){return result;});}export function closeRegisterAPI(closeRegisterParm){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('POST',"/CashManagement/CloseRegister",closeRegisterParm).then(function(result){return result;});}export function SaveClosingNoteAPI(prameters){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('POST',"/CashManagement/SaveClosingNote",prameters).then(function(result){return result;});}
